backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and referee booking requests with admin- and user-level access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style summaries of all major frontend files describing functionality, UI components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide covering prerequisites, build steps, DNS setup, and verification procedures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with full SEO metadata, runtime base URL handling, and structured data for the site.
frontend/LIVE_URLS.md: Documentation of production URLs, canister IDs, and deployment validation checklists.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing the homepage with update frequency and priority.
frontend/SEO.md: SEO configuration guide detailing meta tags, structured data, sitemap, robots.txt, and Search Console setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that tracks page view and renders header, landing page, and footer.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuickReque: Admin view that loads referee requests, handles access errors, and supports copying request details.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Logo component rendering the site logo with configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing branding, navigation shortcuts, contact info, and hours.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, navigation links, admin access, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/lead/ChatbotLead: Interactive chatbot widget for collecting referee request details and submitting them.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact form component handling quick request submission, validation, copy-to-clipboard actions, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero section with marketing text, stats, images, and buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Shows a step-by-step process explanation with icons and a call‑to‑action scroll button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Lists available officiating services with icons and includes a sports coverage section with imagery.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for submitting referee and quick requests using react-query and fetching admin status or all requests from an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, typography rules, and utility classes for the site's theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wraps it with react-query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page assembling marketing sections, admin view when authorized, and a chatbot widget.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/ga4.ts: GA4 analytics wrapper providing safe event, page view, and conversion tracking with no-ops when disabled.
frontend/src/utils/publicSiteBaseUrl.ts: Utilities for resolving and normalizing the site's public base URL and hostname, with env and fallback logic.
frontend/src/utils/siteVersion.ts: Returns the site version from env variables with a default value of '8'.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s versioned state, existing features, known issues, and pending admin‑access improvements for SwiftSport Hub. Identifies an admin‑related loading error and lists feature and requirement metadata.
